cards.rules_text:
When Madeline enters, search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
[i]Reach the Summit[/i] — At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control six or more lands, put two +1/+1 counters on Madeline.

Whenever Ghiaccio enters or attacks, tap up to one target creature and put three stun counters on it.
[i]Gently Weeps[/i] — As an additional cost to cast noncreature spells, you may remove any number of stun counters from among creatures you don't control. That spell costs {1} less to cast for each counter removed this way.
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It has base power and toughness 1/1.

Whenever a player casts a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Clicker.
At the beginning of your upkeep, remove three +1/+1 counters from Clicker. If you do, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

[i]Blood Artist[/i] — Whenever another creature you control dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
{2}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Create a Blood token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]

Mill three cards. An opponent chooses one card from among them to cost 1 life, another to cost 2 life, and a third to cost 3 life. You may put any number of those cards into your hand by paying their associated costs.
Flashback—{4}{B}, Sacrifice a creature.

[i]POTUS[/i] — When Abraham Lincoln enters, you become the monarch.
[i]Emancipation Proclamation[/i] — At the beginning of your end step, if you're the monarch, create a Homeward Path token.
Partner with AK-47 [i](When this enters, target player may put an AK-47 into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]

Trample
When Master Belch enters, create two 1/1 black Ooze creature tokens.
Sacrifice another Ooze: Master Belch gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.
cards.rules_text2:
Reveal this card as you draft it and note a color other than black.
Milky Well enters tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or one mana of any color you noted for cards named Milky Well.

cards.rules_text:
Menace
Whenever Freddy Krueger enters, destroy up to one target tapped creature.
Whenever you commit a crime, Freddy Krueger connives. This ability triggers only once each turn. [i](To have a creature connive, draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]

Vigilance, menace, ward {4}
Whenever you commit a crime, you may discard your hand and have Pyramid Head deal damage equal to its power to you. If you do, draw cards equal to the amount of damage dealt to you. Do this only once each turn. [i](Targeting opponents, anything they control, and/or cards in their graveyards is a crime.)[/i]

Whenever you commit a crime, an opponent chooses one they haven't chosen yet. This ability triggers only once each turn.
• That opponent sacrifices two creatures.
• That opponent discards two cards.
• That opponent loses 4 life.
Sacrifice Billy: Create two 2/2 blue and white Detective creature tokens.

Whenever another creature you control dies, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. If this is the third time this ability has resolved this turn, return target artifact or non-Aura enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it. It's a 3/3 creature in addition to its other types.

When The Administrator enters, create The Intelligence, a legendary artifact with “{T}: Add {U}{R}. You can't spend this mana to cast creature spells.”
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 blue and red Mercenary creature token. 
{T}: If you control exactly nine other creatures, those creatures get +9/+9 until end of turn.

Flash
Flying
When NiGHTS enters, choose two. You may choose the same mode more than once.
• Return another target creature you control to its owner's hand.
• NiGHTS connives. [i](Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]

Multikicker—Tap an untapped creature you control.
Double strike
When Sanji, Impassioned Cook enters, create a Food token for each time it was kicked.
Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

Draft Dogma face up. Turn it face down at the end of the draft round.
As long as Dogma is face up during the draft, you may note each monowhite card you draft.
Flying, lifelink
When you cast Dogma, exile up to one target creature with mana value X or less, where X is the highest number you noted for cards named Dogma.

Squad {2} [i](As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {2} any number of times. When this creature enters, create that many tokens that are copies of it.)[/i]
Combine Unit enters with your choice of a first strike counter, a vigilance counter, or a lifelink counter.

[i]World Famous[/i] — When Lady Gaga enters, you become the monarch.
Whenever you draw a card, amass following 1. [i](Create a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. It's also a following. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black following Army creature token first.)[/i]

Flash
Flying, vigilance
[i]Teleport[/i] — When Starman enters, exile another target creature. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.rules_text2:
Reveal this card as you draft it and note a color other than white.
Alien Hideout enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or one mana of any color you noted for cards named Alien Hideout.

cards.rules_text:
Double strike, vigilance
{1}{W}, Sacrifice two lands: Harness Pearl. [i](Once harnessed, her 🌹 ability is active.)[/i]
🌹 — You may look at the top card of your library any time.
🌹 — Once during each turn, you may cast a spell from the top of your library as long as it targets a creature you control.

cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Are you moving house or something?”
―Big Boss to Solid Snake[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control without a +1/+1 counter on it.
Sacrifice Inspect the Sphinx: Draw two cards. Activate this ability only if you control at least four modified creatures [i](Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)[/i]
cards.rules_text2:
Reveal this card as you draft it and note a color other than blue.
Deep Dark Pyramid enters tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or one mana of any color you noted for cards named Deep Dark Pyramid.

cards.rules_text: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control, except the copy isn't legendary. They fight.

Menace
Ward—Discard a card
When The T-850 Terminator enters or is turned face up, you may put an Equipment card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you do, lose life equal to its mana value, then attach it to The T-850 Terminator.
Disguise {4}{B}

Vanishing 3
When Reverse Bear Trap enters, attach it to target creature.
Whenever you commit a crime, remove a time counter from Reverse Bear Trap.
When Reverse Bear Trap leaves the battlefield, destroy equipped creature. If you control that creature, draw two cards.

When Tim enters, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it.
{4}{W}{B}: Create a white Aura enchantment token named Mask attached to Tim. The token has enchant permanent and umbra armor. Transform Tim. [i](If Tim would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy his mask.)[/i]
cards.rules_text2: Whenever Masky attacks, you may sacrifice another nontoken creature. If you do, you draw three cards.

cards.rules_text:
Choose one —
• Look at target player's hand. Choose a nonland, noncreature card from among them. That player discards that card.
• Destroy target face down creature.
Entwine—Sacrifice a creature [i](Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)[/i]

Haste
Whenever Mel deals combat damage to a player, cloak the top card of that player's library. For as long as it remains face down, you may spend mana of any type to turn it face up.
Disguise {R}{R} [i](You may cast this card face down for {3} as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. Turn it face up any time for its disguise cost.)[/i]

Choose two —
• Return target Aura or Equipment card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Destroy target creature with flying.
• Exile target player's graveyard.
• Destroy target artifact.

When The Rise of Skynet enters, destroy all creatures.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life and cloak the top card of your library.
Whenever you turn a face-down creature face up, put a +1/+1 counter on it. It becomes an artifact in addition to its other types.

[i]Landfall[/i] — Whenever a land you control enters, mill three cards.
{1}, Sacrifice Lost and Found: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

Deathtouch, lifelink
If a creature dying would cause a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.
When Death dies, if it was a creature, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control. It's an enchantment. [i](It's not a creature.)[/i]

Menace
Impending 3—{3}{B} [i](If you cast this for its impending cost, it enters with three time counters and isn't a creature until the last is removed. At the beginning of your end step, remove a time counter from it.)[/i]
[i]Terrifying Presence[/i] — Other creatures get -1/-1.
You may cast this card from your graveyard using its impending ability.

[i]BLOOD IS FUEL[/i] — As an additional cost to cast spells that target creatures you control, you may sacrifice any number of other artifacts. That spell costs {2} less to cast for each of those artifacts.
[i]HELL IS FULL[/i] — Whenever a creature dies, you may exile it and create a Blood token. Do this only once each turn. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]

Smash Cut deals 4 damage to any target.
Up to one target opponent divides all creatures they control into two piles. Choose one of those piles. Creatures in that pile can't block this turn.

Double strike, trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, target opponent creates a 3/2 red Nightmare creature token.

Enchant creature
When Happy Happy Attacky enters, exile the top two cards of your library. You may play them until the end of your next turn.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.
cards.rules_text2:
Reveal this card as you draft it and note a color other than red.
Liliput Steps enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or one mana of any color you noted for cards named Liliput Steps.

cards.rules_text:
+RICOSHOT deals 1 damage to any target.
Create a Treasure token and a Blood token. [i](A Blood token is an artifact with “{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
Rebound [i](If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)[/i]

Kicker—{5}, Discard your hand
When you cast this spell, if it was kicked, copy it five times. You may choose new targets for the copies.
Asura Strike deals 3 damage to target creature.
Exile the top card of your library. You may play it until the end of your next turn

When Enter the Gungeon enters, it deals 2 damage to each creature.
At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top five cards of your library and choose an Aura or Equipment card from among them at random. Exile that card and put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. You may play the exiled card this turn.

Reveal the top seven cards of your library. An opponent separates them into two piles. You exile one pile and put the cards in the other on the bottom of your library in a random order. You may play the exiled cards until the end of your next turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“The pills by themselves won't make you feel better. You'll have to do more than that.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flying
When Judgement Boy enters, choose Love or Money —
• Love — Create a 1/1 white Human creature token. Put a lifelink counter on it.
• Money — Sacrifice any number of creatures, then draw that many cards.

Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. If this spell was cast from your graveyard, create X of those tokens instead.
Zombies you control gain haste and trample until end of turn.
Flashback—{X}{R}{R}{R}, Sacrifice X lands

Flying
[i]Fireball Tennis[/i] — When Ghast enters, it deals 3 damage to target player unless they discard a card. When they discard a card, they copy this ability, except the copy deals 1 more damage. They may choose new targets for the copy.

When Gordon Freeman enters, create an Equipment artifact named Crowbar. It has “Equipped creature gets +3/+0” and equip {3}.
[i]Valiant[/i] — Whenever Gordon Freeman becomes the target of a spell or ability, as you cast your next spell from your hand this turn, it gains cascade. This ability triggers only once each turn.

When Mount Rushmore enters, target opponent becomes the monarch and you exile cards from the top of your library until you exile four creature cards. For the rest of the game, as long as you're the monarch, you may play the exiled creature cards. They're legendary Nobles in addition to their other types.
Nobles you control get +2/+0 and have haste.

When Ari enters, target Human you control explores. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
Modified creatures you control get +1/+1. [i](Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)[/i]

Look at the top six cards of your library. Reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
You gain 6 life.
cards.rules_text2:
Reveal this card as you draft it and note a color other than green.
Mysterious Crash Site enters tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or one mana of any color you noted for cards named Mysterious Crash Site.

cards.rules_text:
When Apocalyptic View enters, mill three cards. Return a creature or land card from among them into your hand.
[i]Landfall[/i] — Whenever a land you control enters, exile up to one target card from a graveyard.

{1}, Exile a card from your graveyard: Put a spore counter on Mooshroom.
Remove three spore counters from Mooshroom: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

[i]World Famous[/i] — When Off the Hook enters, you become the monarch.
If one or more tokens would be created under your control while you're the monarch, twice that many of those tokens are created instead.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn. If that creature would die this turn, instead exile it, then return it to the battlefield under your control. It's an artifact. [i](It's not a creature.)[/i]

[i]World Famous[/i] — When Mettaton enters, you become the monarch.
[i]Sky-High Ratings[/i] — Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Mettaton.
Remove a +1/+1 counter from Mettaton: Create a tapped Treasure token.

If a creature entering would cause a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, if that creature entered from exile or was cast from exile, that ability triggers an additional time.
{W}{U}: Exile target creature you control and put three time counters on it. If it doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend.

Whenever you commit a crime, gain control of target artifact or creature without a stolen heart counter on it. Gain control of that permanent until end of turn and put a stolen heart counter on it. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn. Do this only once each turn.

Whenever one or more other creatures you control enter, until end of turn, target creature you control gains mentor. [i](Whenever that creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power. Multiple instances of mentor trigger separately.)[/i]

[i]Grand Opening[/i] — Whenever a land you control enters, you lose 1 life and create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
Disturb—{2}{B}, Sacrifice five creatures. [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its disturb cost.)[/i]
cards.rules_text2:
Menace, deathtouch, haste
When Springtrap dies, return him to the battlefield transformed with a finality counter on him. [i](He returns as Springtrap)[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Mobilize 1; First strike, haste
If you would create a creature token, you may instead create a 2/1 red and white Robot Warrior artifact creature token. [i](Tokens created by replacing a mobilize token still enter tapped and attacking and are still sacrificed at end of turn.)[/i]

Ward {88} [i](That's eighty eight.)[/i]
When The Delorean enters, scry 3, then exile the top three cards of your library. For each of those cards, put a number of time counters on it equal to its mana value. If it doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend. 
Whenever The Delorean attacks, time travel.
Crew 3

As G-Man's Proposition enters, choose one —
• Step Into the Portal[i] —[/i] Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw three cards and lose 3 life.
• Unwinnable Battle[i] — [/i]When G-Man's Proposition enters, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a lifelink counter on it. It's an Alien. Exile G-Man's Proposition.

Lifelink
Each nonland card in your hand has miracle {W}. [i](You may cast a card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)[/i]
When Jesus Christ dies, exile him with three time counters on him.
Suspend 3—{1}{W}

First strike, deathtouch, menace
When Darth Vader enters, destroy up to one target legendary creature.
[i]Force Choke[/i] — Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, target player loses 3 life unless they discard a card or sacrifice a nonland permanent.

You may play lands from your graveyard. If you play a land this way, it enters with a finality counter on it.
Whenever a land you control enters, you may put three +1/+1 counters on it. If you do, it becomes a 0/0 Golem artifact creature with haste that's still a land.
Golems you control have menace and vigilance.

You may pay {W} rather than this spell's mana cost.
Flash
Enchant creature you control
When Armor of Ice enters, enchanted creature gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn. Then tap that creature and put three stun counters on it if the {W} cost was paid.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+4.

[i]Wobble[/i] — When The Ice Climbers enters, tap target creature and put three stun counters on it. You gain control of that creature for as long as it remains tapped.
Other modified creatures you control have hexproof.

When Doc Brown enters, search your library for an artifact card, exile it, then shuffle. Put a number of time counters on it equal to its mana value. If it doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may time travel. Do this only once each turn.
Whenever you commit a crime, Jacket gains menace until end of turn. If this is the second time this ability has resolved this turn, Jacket gains double strike until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Do you know what time it is?”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
The Gungeon enters tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.
{B}{R}, {T}: The Gungeon deals 2 damage to any target that's the target of a spell or ability you control.

Luigi's Mansion enters tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
{B}{G}, {T}: You may discard a card. Mill two cards, then mill two more if you discarded a card.

Draft Red face up. Turn it face down at the end of the draft round.
As long as Red is face up during the draft, you may note each monored card you draft.
When you cast Red, add four {R}, then exile the top X cards of your library, where X is the highest number you noted for cards named Red. You may play them this turn.

Draft Blue face up. Turn it face down at the end of the draft round.
As long as Blue is face up during the draft, note each monoblue card you draft.
When you cast Blue, draw three cards, then you may cast a spell with mana value X or less from your hand. X is the highest number you noted for cards named Blue.

[i]World is Mine — [/i]When Hatsune Miku enters, you become the monarch.
Whenever another creature or artifact you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on Hatsune Miku. If you're the monarch, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control instead.

When Glimmer of Gold enters, create four Treasure tokens.
At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of target opponent's library. You may play that card this turn, and may spend mana of any type to do so.
